greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = A082895(n)/n, where A082895(n) is the closest number to sigma(n) which is divisible by n.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..100000
program: (PARI) A082898(n) = { my(s=sigma(n), a = ((s\n)*n), b = (1+(s\n))*n); if((b-s) <= abs(a-s), b, a)/n; }; \\ _Antti Karttunen_, Oct 09 2018
results.author: _Labos Elemer_, Apr 22 2003
